name: Mobius (Mobius101)
description:
We are a group of University students where we were assigned to create a 2D game of any kind where our ideas come in place. Once we had the idea, we stick to the idea until the final concept comes out. 

We are a group of three game artists and one programmer and have twelve weeks to complete this assignment. 

P.S We had a change on the road to make the game a bit more different from previous game concept.

Features -

  • Running towards your best high score!
  • Double jump attack
  • Great Soundtrack
  • Projectile against other Projectiles!
  • Appealing animations from other students!
  • Coded by one student!
  • Energy Circle - Projectile shots
  • Bolts In-Game currency to imagine that you can buy things with it!
